Using-the-latest-technology-Flow-deliver: Using the latest technology, Flow delivers a continuously evolving learning and development solution tailored to the hospitality and tourism sector, providing accredited, certificated training throughout the industry.
Easily-tailored-to-fit-into-your-busines: Easily tailored to fit into your business, Flow will have a significant impact on productivity and profitability by developing and motivating staff, reducing training costs and increasing sales.
Flow-has-been-designed-to-inspire-learni: Flow has been designed to inspire learning through our comprehensive portfolio of innovative and engaging online modules. We also deliver control and visibility of all learning and development activity through our versatile and intuitive management system, The Flow Zone.
And-with-over-30-years-of-hospitality-ex: And with over 30 years of hospitality experience, we feel our industry expertise gives us unique empathy with all our clients, enabling an excellent level of service and support.

If-you-have-a-question-that-is-not-answe: If you have a question that is not answered below please do not hesitate to email our helpdesk on help@flowhospitalitytraining.co.uk
Q-What-is-Flow-Hospitality-Training: Q. What is Flow Hospitality Training?
Flow-Hospitality-Training-is-a-fully-onl: Flow Hospitality Training is a fully online product which provides organisations with the training tools required to train and develop staff to build a successful career in the hospitality industry. For people that are looking to work in the hospitality industry the Flow modules provide a great platform for learning.
Q-Is-Flow-training-fully-accredited: Q. Is Flow training fully accredited?
The-Flow-modules-and-exams-are-fully-end: The Flow modules and exams are fully endorsed by the Institute of Hospitality, Scottish Qualifications Authority (SQA) and accredited by the National Skills Academy [NSA].
All-our-modules-are-accredited-by-People: All our modules are accredited by People 1st Quality Mark, the Institute of Hospitality, CPD and SQA.
Our-Food-Safety-modules-are-also-accredi: Our Food Safety modules are also accredited by IQ, Health and Safety by RoSPA and our licensing modules are accredited by SQA.
The-SQA-Privacy-Policy-can-be-found-on-t: The SQA Privacy Policy can be found on their website.
Q-If-I-have-any-questions-regarding-the-: Q. If I have any questions regarding the content of the modules who do I contact?
If-you-have-any-problems-accessing-the-m: If you have any problems accessing the modules contact the helpdesk, available from 9am–6pm, Monday - Saturday, on 0844 445 7119 or email help@flowhospitalitytraining.co.uk. Outside these hours, all emails and phone calls will be responded to within 24 hours.
Q-How-quickly-will-I-be-contacted-after-: Q. How quickly will I be contacted after inputting my initial enquiry?
A-member-of-the-Flow-team-will-contact-y: A member of the Flow team will contact you within 24 hrs of your email or phone call.
Q-Can-I-get-my-Personal-Licence-Holder-P: Q. Can I get my Personal Licence Holder (PLH) qualification through Flow?
In-order-to-gain-your-Personal-Licence-H: In order to gain your Personal Licence Holder qualification either APLH (E&W) or SCPLH (Scotland) you need to purchase the PLH training module from our sister company PLH Online.
Flow-provides-training-on-Licensing-and-: Flow provides training on Licensing and Social Responsibility for front of house staff in either England & Wales or Scotland.
Q-Why-cant-I-log-in-to-the-app-using-my-: Q. Why can’t I log in to the app using my access code?`
In-order-to-log-in-to-the-app-you-must-h: In order to log in to the app you must have an email and password account set up. You can do this by logging on to the module manager with your access code using a web browser on your device.
Q-How-long-does-it-take-to-complete-a-mo: Q. How long does it take to complete a module?
The-times-can-vary-depending-upon-the-le: The times can vary depending upon the level of training required. However, on average, each module will take an individual approx 1 hour to complete.
Q-Are-you-required-to-complete-the-modul: Q. Are you required to complete the modules in any specific order?
Some-companies-require-modules-to-be-com: Some companies require modules to be completed in a certain order. Your training path will tell you if certain modules need to be completed first.
You-will-still-be-able-to-access-your-mo: You will still be able to access your modules; due dates are a guide provided by your company. If you have concerns, please contact your management team.
Q-What-happens-if-I-fail-the-exam: Q. What happens if I fail the exam?
The-failed-exam-screen-will-highlight-th: The failed exam screen will highlight the specific areas of the module that you should revisit to assist you in passing the exam the next time. There is no limit on how many attempts you can take to pass the exam. If you are struggling with an exam, please contact your management.
Q-Can-I-access-the-module-after-passing-: Q. Can I access the module after passing the exam?
Yes-you-can-revisit-the-content-but-you-: Yes, you can revisit the content, but you will not be able to re-sit the exam.
Q-When-will-I-receive-my-certificate: Q. When will I receive my certificate?
The-certificate-can-be-printed-at-the-en: The certificate can be printed at the end of each exam once you successfully pass. If you do not have access to a printer or if you have any difficulty in printing your certificate, then you can access it at a later date via the system. Alternatively, a training manager within your organisation can access the management system and will be able to print certificates if needed.
Q-Can-I-move-my-completed-training-from-: Q. Can I move my completed training from a previous company?
Yes-if-your-previous-company-used-Flow-t: Yes, if your previous company used Flow, then you can contact our helpdesk to get these modules moved. Please send an email with your name, old company, new company and your new job title to help@flowhospitalitytraining.co.uk
Get-in-touch-with-questions-comments-iss: Get in touch with questions, comments, issues, and love for Flow on help@flowhospitalitytraining.co.uk
Our-core-office-hours-are-Monday-Friday-: Our core office hours are Monday-Friday, 9am - 6pm and we aim to respond to all queries within 24 hours.
Q-What-happens-if-my-modules-become-over: Q. What happens if my modules become overdue?
